name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
title: Pearl of Wisdom
description: The Divine Priestess of Watatsumi Island. All of the island's affairs are at this young lady's fingertips.

normal.1: Performs up to 3 consecutive attacks that take the form of swimming fish, dealing <hydro>Hydro DMG</hydro>.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal <hydro>AoE Hydro DMG</hydro> after a short casting time.

plunging.1: Gathering the might of Hydro, Kokomi plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals <hydro>AoE Hydro DMG</hydro> upon impact with the ground.

description.0: Summons a "Bake-Kurage" created from water that can heal her allies.
description.1: Using this skill will apply the <hydro>Wet</hydro> status to Sangonomiya Kokomi.
description.4: Deals <hydro>Hydro DMG</hydro> to surrounding opponents and heals nearby active characters at fixed intervals. This healing is based on Kokomi's Max HP.
description.6: Kokomi needs timely "refreshment" in order to maintain optimal work efficiency.

description.0: Summons the might of Watatsumi, dealing <hydro>Hydro DMG</hydro> to surrounding opponents, before robing Kokomi in a Ceremonial Garment made from the flowing waters of Sangonomiya.
3: Sangonomiya Kokomi's Normal Attack, Charged Attack and Bake-Kurage DMG are increased based on her Max HP.
When her Normal and Charged Attacks hit opponents, Kokomi will restore HP for all nearby party members, and the amount restored is based on her Max HP.
Increases Sangonomiya Kokomi's resistance to interruption and allows her to walk on the water's surface.
description.5: These effects will be cleared once Sangonomiya Kokomi leaves the field.
description.7: Clear light coalesces into robes around Her Excellency, Sangonomiya Kokomi, reflecting her magnificent form.

description.0: If Sangonomiya Kokomi's own Bake-Kurage is on the field when she uses Nereid's Ascension, the Bake-Kurage's duration will be refreshed.

While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by Nereid's Ascension, the Normal and Charged Attack DMG Bonus Sangonomiya Kokomi gains based on her Max HP will receive a further increase based on 15% of her Healing Bonus.
Decreases swimming Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
description.1: Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

description.0: Sangonomiya Kokomi has a 25% Healing Bonus, but a 100% decrease in CRIT Rate.
While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by Nereid's Ascension, the final Normal Attack in Sangonomiya Kokomi's combo will unleash a swimming fish to deal 30% of her Max HP as Hydro DMG.
description.1: This DMG is not considered Normal Attack DMG.

description.0: Sangonomiya Kokomi gains the following Healing Bonuses with regard to characters with 50% or less HP via the following methods:
1: Kurage's Oath Bake-Kurage: 4.5% of Kokomi's Max HP.
Nereid's Ascension Normal and Charged Attacks: 0.6% of Kokomi's Max HP.

constellation3.name: The Moon, A Ship O'er the Seas

description.0: Increases the Level of Nereid's Ascension by 3.
While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by Nereid's Ascension, Sangonomiya Kokomi's Normal Attack SPD is increased by 10%, and Normal Attacks that hit opponents will restore 0.8 Energy for her.
description.1: This effect can occur once every 0.2s.

constellation5.name: All Streams Flow to the Sea

description.0: Increases the Level of Kurage's Oath by 3.

While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by Nereid's Ascension, Sangonomiya Kokomi gains a 40% Hydro DMG Bonus for 4s when her Normal and Charged Attacks heal, or would heal, any party member with 80% or more HP.
